4: Added the top.gg token so that the bot stats can be on the website
Added this changelog file for future use so people can read the changelogs, past and preset.

0: Added changelog command use with n!changelog
Added custom prefix ability use with n!setPrefix
Added an easter egg!
If you find issues with the bot or have suggestions you can always send them in the server's respective channels!
1: Fixed a bug that would cause the bot to crash
2: Actually fixed the bug that caused the bot crash
3: Removed the very in-your-face error message that the changelog command would give if an incorrect version was specified
Also may or may not have kept it in as an easter egg
4: Fixed a bug with the prefix command breaking the bot
Made the prefix length a max of 5 characters
*Finally* made the bot check the user who runs the n!check command if left blank
Added a small feature relating to an EE
Changed a few commands to have different aliases
5: Fixed an issue where server names would not be saved when the bot joined a new server
7: Added a link to the support server in the help file
Direct Messaging the bot 'help' or 'n!help' will give you the help file
Fixed a typo in the help file
Changed the embed color for the changelog error response
Added a forced cooldown for people spamming way too much
8: Made the n!global command a bit faster

0: Added achievements that can be earned when an easter egg is found
Fixed a problem that would cause the bot to give errors when posting the server count to top.gg
DMing the bot `help` or `n!help` is no longer case sensitive
Fixed a few grammar errors :>
Significantly decreased the time it takes for n!global to respond
Removed the server names from the global leaderboard
Fixed bottom user
Removed blacklist
1: Fixed bug where the bot would not add a server to the database when it joined (At least I think I did)
Fixed the leaderboards not showing the top ten properly if people had left the server
Fixed the global leaderboard not showing people correctly (God I should have done this earlier)
You can now check yours and others achievements with n!ach instead of the garbage that used to be n!achievements cuz that was god awful to type out everytime
Made n!check work better and it will also display your total tracked words too

0: Fixed a bug that would cause n!check to not work with arguments
You now only have to have the manage channels or the manage server permissions to change server settings
Giving the global command a argument, for example 2, will now show places 11 through 20
Bot will no longer crash upon setting a bad prefix
Fixed a but where if you used n!check in a server where you had not said anywords but had said words elsewhere it would say that you have sent no words
Added new extra help! If you run n!help (command), the bot will give you extra info on that specific command
When calling the global command, a little message will pop up saying that the bot is loading
Fixed a bug that would cause the first word said to be tracked and put into the database imediately

Fixed a bug where deleting your data and then sending a bunch of tracked words would cause the bot to add multiple entries to the database cause a sort of multiplication when sending more tracked words
1: Bot is now on a VPS which means its not hosted on my computer and we are gonna see if that makes the bot any faster
2: Removed extra queries and some unused variables
3: Added an antispam for counted words and commands to keep the bot running faster
Fixed a bug where words were not being tracked
Added a message that is sent when the bot joins a server giving info on how to setup the bot
Fixed a bug where dming the bot a message other than n!help or help would cause an error
Added a seperate embeds file to store all of the big embeds that don't have changing text
